title: Kamala Harris wearing the same outfit from her 'drunk' rant in Thanksgiving video?
content: Kamala Harris released a Thanksgiving video in which she and her husband, Doug Emhoff, shared their gratitude for family, friends, and service members. Social media users noted she wore the same outfit as in a previous video in which she consoled her followers and also released her rant. It looked both the videos were shot back-to-back and the Vice president was apparently seen in the same clothes.
summary: Kamala Harris released a Thanksgiving video in which she and her husband, Doug Emhoff, shared their gratitude for family, friends, and service members. Social media users noted she wore the same outfit as in a previous video in which she consoled her followers and also released her rant.  It looked both the videos were shot back-to-back and the Vice president was apparently seen in the same clothes.

title: Will Hillary Clinton run for president in 2028? Donald Trump Jr reacts
content: 77-year-old Hillary Clinton announced a speaking event on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the Clinton Presidential Center in Arkansas. But this announcement turned into the breeding ground of theories that Hillary who would be 81 in 2028 may run in the 2028 presidential race. Social media users even started to speculate who would be Hillary's running mate in 2028.
summary: 77-year-old Hillary Clinton announced a speaking event on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the Clinton Presidential Center in Arkansas. But this announcement turned into the breeding ground of theories that Hillary who would be 81 in 2028 may run in the 2028 presidential race. Social media users even started to speculate who would be Hillary's running mate in 2028.

title: Democrats want their own Joe Rogan: 'But I was on their side...'
content: Republicans have their own network of influencers and Joe Rogan has become the most prominent one though Rogan was the last to endorse Donald Trump. In a latest podcast, Joe Rogan said the Democrats want their own Joe Rogan almost forgetting that Joe Rogan was on their side until they drove him away.
summary: Republicans have their own network of influencers and Joe Rogan has become the most prominent one though Rogan was the last to endorse Donald Trump. In a latest podcast, Joe Rogan said the Democrats want their own Joe Rogan almost forgetting that Joe Rogan was on their side until they drove him away.

title: Amid divorce rumors, Meghan Markle seeks more time from US authorities to correct this
content: ​ Meghan will now fully focus on her career but her jam brand American Riviera Orchard could not procure a trademark because of some issues with the filing. Meghan was given three months to address the errors in the application in August. According to reports, she has now asked for another three months to correct the error in the filing.
summary: ​ Meghan will now fully focus on her career but her jam brand American Riviera Orchard could not procure a trademark because of some issues with the filing. Meghan was given three months to address the errors in the application in August. According to reports, she has now asked for another three months to correct the error in the filing.

title: Jimmy Fallon slammed for bizarre fashion choice at Macy's Thanksgiving parade: 'Drinksgiving'
content: Jimmy Fallon puzzled fans by wearing sunglasses in rainy weather during his 10th Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade appearance, sparking speculation about a hangover. ​"Sunglasses in the rain is the most Jimmy Fallon that Jimmy can Fallon," one user wrote. Another wrote: "Jimmy Fallon on the least sunny day NYC has ever seen," with picture of a young Jodie Sweetin in Full House wearing oversized yellow glasses
summary: Jimmy Fallon puzzled fans by wearing sunglasses in rainy weather during his 10th Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade appearance, sparking speculation about a hangover. ​"Sunglasses in the rain is the most Jimmy Fallon that Jimmy can Fallon," one user wrote. Another wrote: "Jimmy Fallon on the least sunny day NYC has ever seen," with picture of a young Jodie Sweetin in Full House wearing oversized yellow glasses

title: Indian-origin neurosurgeon in US fined over $2 million for medicare fraud involving fake surgeries
content: Indian-origin neurosurgeon Dr Rajesh Bindal from Houston has been fined over $2 million for fraudulently billing Medicare and FEHBP for surgeries he did not perform. Bindal allegedly taped devices behind patients' ears instead of conducting proper surgeries and, in some cases, allowed unqualified individuals to perform the procedures. Authorities emphasized the importance of accountability in federal healthcare programs.
summary: Indian-origin neurosurgeon Dr Rajesh Bindal from Houston has been fined over $2 million for fraudulently billing Medicare and FEHBP for surgeries he did not perform. Bindal allegedly taped devices behind patients' ears instead of conducting proper surgeries and, in some cases, allowed unqualified individuals to perform the procedures. Authorities emphasized the importance of accountability in federal healthcare programs.

title: Vladimir Putin threatens Ukraine with Oreshnik missile strikes on 'decision-making centres'
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin warned that Russia might target decision-making centers in Kyiv using its new hypersonic missile, Oreshnik, if Ukraine continues to strike Russian territory with Western-supplied missiles. This follows intensified strikes, including a significant Russian assault on Ukraine, leading to major power outages.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin warned that Russia might target decision-making centers in Kyiv using its new hypersonic missile, Oreshnik, if Ukraine continues to strike Russian territory with Western-supplied missiles. This follows intensified strikes, including a significant Russian assault on Ukraine, leading to major power outages.

title: 'Never going to forget how Facebook...': Laura Loomer enraged as Zuckerberg, Trump dine together
content: Far-right activist Laura Loomer criticized Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg for his past actions against Donald Trump, following their dinner at Mar-a-Lago. From suspending Donald Trump's Facebook account to suppressing the Hunter Biden laptop scandal, Laura Loomer pointed out 'Meta scandals' one by one and did not hold herself back. "Why did Mark Zuckerberg ban Donald Trump and his supporters while allowing ISIS to autogenerate accounts?" she posted.
summary: Far-right activist Laura Loomer criticized Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg for his past actions against Donald Trump, following their dinner at Mar-a-Lago. From suspending Donald Trump's Facebook account to suppressing the Hunter Biden laptop scandal, Laura Loomer pointed out 'Meta scandals' one by one and did not hold herself back. "Why did Mark Zuckerberg ban Donald Trump and his supporters while allowing ISIS to autogenerate accounts?" she posted.

title: Macy's Thanksgiving parade: Mass arrests as anti-Israel protesters block route
content: Anti-Israel protesters disrupted Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade in New York City for the second consecutive year Thursday. They halted the Ronald McDonald balloon on the parade route, shouting pro-Palestinian slogans. "Don't celebrate genocide!" the placards that the protesters waved sitting in the parade's path read. The NYPD swiftly arrested numerous protesters and maintained heightened security amid concerns of potential terrorist threats during the event.
summary: Anti-Israel protesters disrupted Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade in New York City for the second consecutive year Thursday. They halted the Ronald McDonald balloon on the parade route, shouting pro-Palestinian slogans. "Don't celebrate genocide!" the placards that the protesters waved sitting in the parade's path read. The NYPD swiftly arrested numerous protesters and maintained heightened security amid concerns of potential terrorist threats during the event.

title: Donald Trump has a new favorite child. And it is not Barron yet
content: Donald Trump's eldest son Donald Trump Jr emerged as a loyal enforcer this time while in 2017 he was the central figure of the investigation into the Trump campaign's ties with Russia. During Trump's first term, Don Jr was called reckless but this time, he is the stickler who roped in JD Vance, RFK Jr for his father's campaign and now that all his decisions paid off well, he wants no role in the administration as he prefers to be in the outside.
summary: Donald Trump's eldest son Donald Trump Jr emerged as a loyal enforcer this time while in 2017 he was the central figure of the investigation into the Trump campaign's ties with Russia. During Trump's first term, Don Jr was called reckless but this time, he is the stickler who roped in JD Vance, RFK Jr for his father's campaign and now that all his decisions paid off well, he wants no role in the administration as he prefers to be in the outside.

title: Iran general killed in Syria clashes: Media
content: A general in Iran's Revolutionary Guards was killed in Syria on Thursday during fighting between Syrian government forces and jihadists, an Iranian news agency reported. "General Kioumars Pourhashemi, one of Iran's senior advisers in Aleppo, was killed in an attack carried out by takfiri terrorist mercenaries," Tasnim news agency reported.
summary: A general in Iran's Revolutionary Guards was killed in Syria on Thursday during fighting between Syrian government forces and jihadists, an Iranian news agency reported.  "General Kioumars Pourhashemi, one of Iran's senior advisers in Aleppo, was killed in an attack carried out by takfiri terrorist mercenaries," Tasnim news agency reported.

title: YouTuber shares video of 'zombie-like people' walking on San Francisco streets; sparks debate
content: Indian YouTuber Ishan Sharma shared a video showing alarming scenes of homelessness and drug addiction in San Francisco, calling it the 'most unsafe place'. The footage depicts people in severe distress, sparking reactions online. Elon Musk also highlighted similar issues, describing the city's homeless as 'violent, drug zombies' and noting severe property value decline.
summary: Indian YouTuber Ishan Sharma shared a video showing alarming scenes of homelessness and drug addiction in San Francisco, calling it the 'most unsafe place'. The footage depicts people in severe distress, sparking reactions online. Elon Musk also highlighted similar issues, describing the city's homeless as 'violent, drug zombies' and noting severe property value decline.

title: Diddy's son blacklisted from renting LA mansions for parties: 'They would wreck the house'
content: Sean Diddy's son Justin Combs has been banned from renting party properties in Los Angeles due to previous incidents of property damage. P Diddy, currently awaiting trial for serious charges including sex trafficking, has had his bail denied again after being caught misusing jail communication privileges. The nature of parties that Diddy's son holds is not known but his lawyer said he did nothing wrong.
summary: Sean Diddy's son Justin Combs has been banned from renting party properties in Los Angeles due to previous incidents of property damage. P Diddy, currently awaiting trial for serious charges including sex trafficking, has had his bail denied again after being caught misusing jail communication privileges. The nature of parties that Diddy's son holds is not known but his lawyer said he did nothing wrong.

title: Why Trump wanted to deport Prince Harry
content: This followed controversy surrounding Prince Harry’s revelations in his memoir, where he admitted to past drug use, including cocaine, cannabis, and psychedelics. These admissions sparked legal scrutiny, as US immigration law can deem individuals inadmissible based on drug use. Questions have been raised about the accuracy of Prince Harry’s visa application, with some suggesting that any discrepancies could lead to deportation.
summary: This followed controversy surrounding Prince Harry’s revelations in his memoir, where he admitted to past drug use, including cocaine, cannabis, and psychedelics. These admissions sparked legal scrutiny, as US immigration law can deem individuals inadmissible based on drug use. Questions have been raised about the accuracy of Prince Harry’s visa application, with some suggesting that any discrepancies could lead to deportation.

title: China launches combat readiness patrols around contested South China Sea shoal
content: Beijing has increased military activities in the South China Sea and near Taiwan, with air and naval patrols around Scarborough Shoal and the deployment of military aircraft and warships. Escalating regional tensions, China's actions have been condemned by Taiwan and the Philippines, prompting warnings from Chinese officials about potential responses to perceived provocations.
summary: Beijing has increased military activities in the South China Sea and near Taiwan, with air and naval patrols around Scarborough Shoal and the deployment of military aircraft and warships. Escalating regional tensions, China's actions have been condemned by Taiwan and the Philippines, prompting warnings from Chinese officials about potential responses to perceived provocations.

title: Poll guru Nate Silver slams Kamala Harris' campaign for blaming hurricane Helene for election defeat
content: “They don’t even see themselves as victims so much as Non-Player Characters with no will of their own," Silver wrote. “The idea the hurricane was some massive October surprise that specifically disadvantaged Harris is just so weird,” Nate Silver wrote. “Relatively speaking, NC/GA even showed less vote swing than other swing states.”
summary: “They don’t even see themselves as victims so much as Non-Player Characters with no will of their own," Silver wrote. “The idea the hurricane was some massive October surprise that specifically disadvantaged Harris is just so weird,” Nate Silver wrote. “Relatively speaking, NC/GA even showed less vote swing than other swing states.”

title: Blasphemy Law: Why UK PM Keir Starmer is under fire
content: Caught in the crossfire is Labour leader Sir Keir Starmer, whose cautious response to the controversy has drawn ire from critics on all sides. In a political moment that demands clarity and conviction, Starmer’s apparent hesitancy to defend free speech has left many questioning his leadership—and the Labour Party’s commitment to democratic principles.
summary: Caught in the crossfire is Labour leader Sir Keir Starmer, whose cautious response to the controversy has drawn ire from critics on all sides. In a political moment that demands clarity and conviction, Starmer’s apparent hesitancy to defend free speech has left many questioning his leadership—and the Labour Party’s commitment to democratic principles.

title: Fans want Elon Musk vs Zuckerberg cage fight at Trump's Mar-a-Lago as this video goes viral
content: Now that Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg went to Mar-a-Lago to meet Donald Trump and then they dined together, X users want the Elon Musk vs Zuckerberg cage fight to take place at Mar-a-Lago. Speculations of a cage fight between the two have been going around for many months and now the old video of Elon Musk saying he's ready to fight Zuckerberg any place, any time, any rules is going viral.
summary: Now that Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg went to Mar-a-Lago to meet Donald Trump and then they dined together, X users want the Elon Musk vs Zuckerberg cage fight to take place at Mar-a-Lago. Speculations of a cage fight between the two have been going around for many months and now the old video of Elon Musk saying he's ready to fight Zuckerberg any place, any time, any rules is going viral.

title: 'Fitting tribute': How massive Trump ‘Fight Fight Fight’ statue celebrates his legacy
content: ​The statue commemorates a moment etched into public memory: Trump, bloodied but unbroken, raising his fist in defiance after surviving an attack during a campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, last July. The image, captured by Associated Press photographer Evan Vucci, quickly became a cultural phenomenon, hailed as a symbol of strength by his supporters and a powerful snapshot of a deeply divided nation.
summary: ​The statue commemorates a moment etched into public memory: Trump, bloodied but unbroken, raising his fist in defiance after surviving an attack during a campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, last July. The image, captured by Associated Press photographer Evan Vucci, quickly became a cultural phenomenon, hailed as a symbol of strength by his supporters and a powerful snapshot of a deeply divided nation.

title: Will IRS be deleted by DOGE? Elon Musk says...
content: “The IRS just said it wants $20B more money. Do you think its budget should be: Increased, Same, Decreased, Deleted,” Musk asked in the poll. And more than 60 per cent of users polled in favor of deleting its budget. Only 3.9 per cent said the federal agency’s budget should remain the same, 5. 6 per cent felt it deserved more money and 29.9 per cent said the IRS budget should be decreased.
summary: “The IRS just said it wants $20B more money. Do you think its budget should be: Increased, Same, Decreased, Deleted,” Musk asked in the poll. And more than 60 per cent of users polled in favor of deleting its budget. Only 3.9 per cent said the federal agency’s budget should remain the same, 5. 6 per cent felt it deserved more money and 29.9 per cent said the IRS budget should be decreased.
